titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to acquire certain real property adjacent to the Andrew Johnson National Historic Site in Greeneville, Tennessee, for inclusion within the national cemetery located in that site.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Interior Department, OMB.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Agriculture Department, Interior Department, OMB.
Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks. Hearings held.

committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 5/28/1987--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to acquire by donation specified lands in Greene County, Tennessee, for inclusion within the national cemetery in the Andrew Johnson National Historic Site, Greeneville, Tennessee.
